message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to someone in your position.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to keep my expenses lower. Would you consider selling it to me for $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could agree to $11,500 as a compromise, representing a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still aiming to keep my expenses low. Could you consider $10,500 as a fair price for the product?
